title: Turret range
body:
Hello, i have a question. i had LoL and then i deleted it and now i have it again. in my first game that i played i saw the turret circels. (what the turret range is) but now i cant see it anymore how can i see it again because now i dont know how far i can run for the turret can hit me.

i cant see it in 5v5 beginner.

plzz help me

-=+=-
Skynight49

replies.body: I believe the turret ranges only show up in the tutorial or practice mode. You are not meant to be able to see those ranges in other game modes.
